mapper.select: SELECT MAX(DOCNO) AS MAX_DOCNO FROM ( SELECT #{bzcls1} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || MAX(LPAD(SUBSTR(BII_DOCNO,-5)+1,5,0)) AS DOCNO FROM BZ_IMG_INFO WHERE SUBSTR(BII_DOCNO,1,10) = #{bzcls1} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT #{bzcls1} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || '00001' FROM DUAL )
